tool_description: This API is used to scrape data from the Meta Threads app. [@newton_jnr](https://t.me/newton_jnr)
name: Meta Threads Scraper
title: Meta Threads Scraper

api_list.name: Get User Reposts
api_list.description: Retrieve all user reposts. Requires username

api_list.name: Get User ID
api_list.description: Extract userid from  username. Username example: `zuck`

api_list.name: Get Post ID
api_list.description: Get post id from shortcode. Shortcode example:` Czrr520PZfh`

api_list.name: Get Thread Info / Details
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve thread full information, get thread replies, and more.

api_list.name: Get User Info
api_list.description:
This endpoint is used to retrieve user data and information.
There is no need to pass the user ID; all you need is a username or url. Let the API handle the difficult job.

api_list.name: Get User Threads / Posts
api_list.description:
The endpoint is used to retrieve all user's threads or posts.
All you need is the username or URL to the user profile. No need for a user ID; the API will handle the difficult job.

api_list.name: Get User Replies
api_list.description:
This endpoint is used to get all the replies from the user.
Simply pass the url to the user's profile, or just the username. No need for a user ID; the API will handle the rest.
